brief.content-text:
Diagram 4, Activity

The diagram depicts an activity in which you must match the client's request to one of the following services:
DNS
Telnet
Email
DHCP
Web
FTP

One.I need the IP address of this website so I can connect to it.
Two.I need my IP address, subnet mask, and default gateway.
Three.I need to transfer this file to a local server and make sure it is received.
Four.I need to connect to a remote server and run some commands.
Five.I need to request a web page from a web server.
Six.I need to send an email to my friend.
